Identification.ShortTitle: Civilian Crews on Auxiliary Vessels Direction
Identification.LongTitle: Direction Made Pursuant to Section 224 of the National Defence Act Respecting Civilian Crews on Auxiliary Vessels

Section.Text: This Direction may be cited as the Civilian Crews on Auxiliary Vessels Direction.
It is hereby directed that the Government Vessels Discipline Act shall apply to civilian crews engaged for service on auxiliary vessels of the Canadian Forces.
